wikitext.*:
'''Robert C. Clardy''' was one of the designers of ''[[War in Middle Earth]]'',<ref>[http://www.mobygames.com/game/dos/jrr-tolkiens-war-in-middle-earth War in Middle-Earth] at MobyGames (retrieved 7 December 2010)</ref>  together with [[Alan Clark]] and [[Mike Singleton]]. He and Ann Dickens Clardy founded [[Synergistic Software, inc.]].
